title: Shopify Customers Can Now Pay In USDC Via Solana Pay
description: Solana Pay, the payment protocol built on the Solana blockchain, is now plugged into e-commerce giant Shopify, allowing users to pay in USD Coin (USDC), the companies announced Wednesday.

title: FTX Bankruptcy Burning Through $1.5M in Legal Costs Every Day
description: Creditors are lamenting the rapid drain of cash from the global exchange’s bankruptcy as the process stretches over more months.

title: SEC, DOJ file charges against creator of little-known Blazar Token
description:
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) filed charges against John DeSalvo, the creator of a minor cryptocurrency called Blazar Token, on Aug. 23. The agency said that DeSalvo created Blazar Token in 2021 and raised $620,000 from 220 investors before the token ultimately collapsed in May 2022. DeSalvo once worked as a State Correctional […]

The post SEC, DOJ file charges against creator of little-known Blazar Token appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: BRICS: Dollar dominance is safe — at least for now
description: Critics have long jeered at the towering might of the greenback, but it’s not going anywhere soon. title: Uh-oh: U.S. gives China advise on economic slump
description: It seems the tables have turned. The U.S., in a bold move, is knocking on China’s door, urging transparency regarding the state of its economy. title: Eurozone activity dips: ECB’s next move in question
description: An unsettling cloud of uncertainty hovers over the Eurozone as the business scene faces sharp setbacks, throwing the European Central Bank’s (ECB) anticipated interest rate hike into murky waters. title: Citi survey: more firms exploring blockchain despite FTX setback
description: Citi's recent report highlights the growing engagement with DLT and crypto, emphasizing both the progress and challenges faced by the sector in the past year

title: Hong Kong’s scholar backs HKD stablecoin to take on USD and USDT
description: The Vice President of Hong Kong's University of Science and Technology reiterates the proposal for launching a stablecoin tied to HKD to take on USDT and USD

title: BNB Falls 14% After Binance Helps Russians ‘Move Money’
description:
The Wall Street Journal (WSJ) claimed that the leading crypto exchange Binance is helping Russians “move money.” According to the report, Binance still handles transactions for a minimum of five Russian financial institutions that have been sanctioned by Western countries. Binance was already in the limelight since July due to accusations of supporting money laundering […]

The post BNB Falls 14% After Binance Helps Russians ‘Move Money’ appeared first on Coin Edition.
